title: Remove Rostock event from seed data lookup

requirements.summary: Remove all Kulturzentrum Rostock event entries from frontend event ID lookup table
acceptanceCriteria: No entry in `eventIdLookup.ts` has a composite key whose dateTime nanoseconds correspond to any timestamp on 2026-03-05.
No entry references a venue or city string containing 'Rostock' or 'Kulturzentrum'.
The Add to Radar functionality for all other events continues to work correctly using their existing lookup entries.

file_operations.description: Perform an exhaustive audit and removal of every entry whose composite key corresponds to the Kulturzentrum Rostock event (Thu 5 Mar 2026). Search by dateTime nanoseconds matching '2026-03-05T...' timestamps and by any city or venue string containing 'Rostock' or 'Kulturzentrum'. Remove all matching entries across all artist keys (including Richie Hawtin, Juan Atkins, Joey Beltram, and any other artist). Verify no stale lookup entries reference this event ID after removal.
